attributes.action: charge foreign lorry drivers for the useage of our roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should charge foreign lorry drivers a fee of £25 minimum for the useage of our roads in transporting the goods around the country,looking at the state of roads like M20, M26,M25 it is just full of these drivers roaring along damaging the roads and not contributing to the repair of them.These drivers never contribute to any fees for driving in this country as most fuel up in Calais where the fuel is 50% less than here so a £25 fee should be considered,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
